Pattern Library

Carousels

IMAGES:

We recommend a minimum image width of 1600px for this component.

RULES & DEPENDENCIES:

This component will have fields for:

  • perPage: number of slides to show per page (default is 2)
  • see more options at https://ssense.github.io/vue-carousel/api/

EXAMPLES:

Card Carousel Example

shows 3 on desktop, 2 on tablet, and 1 on mobile
